action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a plate of food consisting of a piece of grilled chicken, a serving of roasted potatoes garnished with chives, and a portion of steamed broccoli. The plate is placed on a beige tablecloth, and there is a fork and a knife on the right side of the plate.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a plate of food consisting of a grilled steak, boiled potatoes, carrots, broccoli, and a slice of lemon. The plate is placed on a colorful tablecloth, and there is a knife and a fork on either side of the plate.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image shows a plate of food consisting of a piece of grilled chicken, a serving of roasted potatoes garnished with chives, and a portion of steamed broccoli. The plate is placed on a beige tablecloth, and there is a fork and a knife on the right side of the plate.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: What type of meat is on the plate in your image?

QUESTION: What type of vegetables are on the plate in your image?

ANSWER: Grilled chicken.

ANSWER: Broccoli.
